name: Amber
title: HTML Question
post: I wanted to know what HTML stood for?

comments.name: Cynthia
comments.answer: It stands for Hypertext Markup Language.

name: Tameka
title: What is a Var?
post: So I am just getting into JS and don't get Var can someone help?

comments.name: Hannah
comments.answer: Var in JS declares a variable. Which you use to store information.
